query.name: carByVin
query.jpql: select c from ref_Car c where c.vin = :vin

query.name: userByLogin
query.jpql: select u from sec$User u where u.login = :login

query.name: currentUser
query.jpql: select u from sec$User u where u.id = :session$userId

query.name: allColours
query.jpql: select u from ref$Colour u order by u.name

query.name: coloursByNames
query.jpql: select u from ref$Colour u where u.name in :names order by u.name

query.name: coloursByIds
query.jpql: select u from ref$Colour u where u.id in :ids order by u.name

query.name: coloursFromThreeToFive
query.jpql: select u from ref$Colour u order by u.name

query.name: getDriversByStatus
query.jpql: select u from ref$Driver u where u.status = :status
